messages.content: What does it actually cover?

It covers theft, fire/water damage to your belongings, liability if someone gets hurt in your apartment, and hotel costs if your unit becomes unlivable. Most policies start at just $100,000 coverage. Would you like me to send you comparison quotes?
How much notice do I need to give before moving out?

You need to provide 30 days written notice before your intended move-out date. This can be done via email or our tenant portal. The notice needs to be received by the last day of the month to avoid charges for the following month.
What if I give notice mid-month?

If you give notice mid-month, you'll still owe rent for 30 days from the notice date. For example, notice on the 15th means you'd pay through the 15th of next month. I always recommend timing notice to align with month-end to avoid partial month charges.
